plugin.name: sdl
plugin.description: SDL (Simple DirectMedia Layer) support for GStreamer

element.name: sdlaudiosink
element.description: Output to a sound card via SDLAUDIO
element.author: Edgard Lima <edgard.lima@indt.org.br>
